message.raw: fix camera rotation issue reported in https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/401, where atlas v3 has finite roll and yaw angles, and combination yields wrong results.  this patch removes historical use of sceneNode(roll, yaw) and pitchNode(pitch) separations, it just uses sceneNode for all rotations and the issue appears fixed.  Need more clean up and testing.  on a separate topic, tracking has limited pitch range, may be able to extend it.

Need more clean up and testing. on a separate topic, tracking has limited pitch range, may be able to extend it.
